title: How can we record in locked 60fps @1080p?
content:
I am trying to record video in 60fps for 1080p and I am forced to select an option that switches between 30fps through 60fps. The priority is set on lighting.

I would like to have a manual toggle for 30/60/Auto FPS please.
I know the phone can do 120fps at 1080p, so I don't see why this option doesn't exist. 

Thank you.
